title: In-Game Bug (Cannot open/select anything)
body:
I have come across a bug where my champion will level up, and as I go to upgrade a skill (with both clicking and Ctrl + Q/W/E/R) it won't upgrade. While this happens, I have no control over my character, so they keep running in the direction they are facing, and killing minions as they go along (usually resulting in my death). Another bug I have encountered is one that does not let me open the shop, regardless of whether i click on it, or press the P button (to open shop). All of these bugs that I have encountered (from what I hear from others) only happens on Mac clients and usually lasts for between 30 seconds to a minute.
Please fix these bugs ASAP as it affects everyone's games immensely!
Thank you.

replies.body: >**DO NOT** post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
